page.title: 18A Time For Worry.
page.content: The British Petroleum Oil Refinery at Llandarcy near Skewen has been the major employer of men in the village since the 1920's.It has had a tremendous effect on Skewen in that the village has grown to be one of the largest villages in Britain if not Europe.Many houses have been built to accomadate the men who have moved into the area to work in the refinery.There has also been many smaller businesses set up in the district as a direct result of the oilworks. Recently B.P.announced that their refinery at Llandarcy was to be run down with the consequent loss of approximately 800 jobs.At the moment the Union of the men working there are going back and fore to London trying to get the management of the company to change its mind.The future for Skewen,however, remains bleak.
